<MethodEndpoint

Returns state paths for the specified commitments.   Example: `GET /<network>/statePaths?commitments=cm1,cm2,...`

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
